name: Paypal Shortcodes
author: SWERgroup

sections.description:
This plugin allow to insert Paypal buttons in your posts or pages, just using a shortcode.
You can define your email and currency in the Settings â€º Writing admin panel.

[paypal type=”add” name=”Item Name vol. 1″ amount=”12.99″]

This shortcode will print the “Add to cart” button: it will add “Item Name vol. 1” (priced 12.99[currency]) in your paypal cart.

[paypal type=”view”]

This shortcode will print the “View cart” button.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin Zip archive.
  2. Upload paypal-shortcodes folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Edit paypal-shortcode.php and define your settings.
  5. Enjoy ðŸ™‚

short_description: This plugin allow to insert Paypal buttons in your posts or pages with a shortcode like [paypal type="add|view"].
